text: Nectophryne, or African tree toads, is a genus of true toads. There are only two species. They live in western Africa - Nigeria, Cameroon, Gabon, northeastern Congo, Bioko and Equatorial Guinea. ==Species== Binomial Name and Author Common Name Nectophryne afra African Tree Toad Nectophryne batesii Bates' Tree Toad ==Other websites== * . 2007.
